game.name: Buyhads
game.shortDescription: Buyhads -2D puzzle platformer in which you have to fight robots to find the codes you need to complete.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Buyhads -2D puzzle platformer in which you have to fight robots to find the codes you need to complete.

reviewHighlights.text: Stuck on level 1 unable to finish, not sure how to get the code to get past the first laser wall. Says the game is 2.88 gb when you go to download it...
